Title: Cross River govt advances payroll integration for new recruits
Summary: Cross River State Government has announced significant progress in integrating newly recruited workers into its payroll system . According to a statement issued by the Office of the Accountant General, a total of 1,221 workers have been onboarded .

Title: Police nab suspected drug dealer, seize tramadol, diazepam worth N12.2m
Summary: The Bauchi State Police Command has arrested a suspected narcotics dealer, Ogbu Simon, and seized illicit drugs valued at over N12.2 million . According to the police, the suspect, who was arrested in Ningi Local Government Area of the state, is a suspected drug dealer .

Title: US halts immigration applications for 19 countries
Summary: US government halts immigration applications for citizens from 19 nations, including Afghanistan, Yemen and Haiti . The US government has halted immigration . applications for those from 19 countries, including Yemen, Afghanistan, Haiti and Afghanistan .

Title: Ajadi visits Alaafin, seeks royal blessings for 2027 Oyo governorship bid
Summary: Ambassador Olufemi Ajadi Oguntoyinbo visited the Alaafin of Oyo, Oba Abimbola Akeem Owoade I, to seek traditional guidance and prayers ahead of the 2027 governorship election in Oyo State . Ajadi, who arrived at the palace with members of his team, arrived

Title: Pope plans trip to Africa, starting with Algeria
Summary: Pope Leo XIV said he would like to visit Algeria in 2026 as part of a voyage to Africa . Wrapping up his first international trip as pontiff, he said he wants to visit the African continent .

Title: ‘Help me’ – 2face cries out to Nigerians amid marital crisis
Summary: Nigerian music icon Innocent Idibia speaks for the first time since controversy involving him and his wife, Edo State lawmaker Natasha Osawaru, began trending online . 2face has spoken out to Nigerians amid marital crisis .

Title: Trump calls Somali immigrants ‘garbage’ at cabinet meeting
Summary: Earlier, Trump said refugees were a main cause of social problems in the U.S. He cited Minnesota as an example, saying the state had been taken over by “hundreds of thousands of refugees from Somalia”

Title: ‘Allow us save you’ – Hyacinth Idibia appeals to 2face
Summary: Hyacinth Idibia speaks for the first time since controversy involving the singer and his new wife, Edo lawmaker Natasha Osau, erupted online . The brother of 2face Idibia has appealed to 2face for his support .

Title: Osun 2026: Accord Party woos Adeleke
Summary: Adeleke is seeking a second tenure in the 2026 off-cycle governorship election . He is considering a more stable political platform ahead of the poll .

Title: Breaking: CBN scraps cash deposit limits, raises weekly withdrawal threshold
Summary: Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has removed all limits on cash deposits . The move is a significant reversal of earlier cash-tightening measures introduced under the previous administration .

Title: A’Ibom clears N39.8bn debt, moves to boost IGR
Summary: Akwa Ibom State governor, Umo Eno, has cleared all outstanding loans totalling N39.831 billion inherited from his predecessor, Mr. Udom Emmanuel . Title: FG opens December savings bonds subscription at N1,000 per unit
Summary: The Federal Government has opened subscriptions for two tranches of its Savings Bonds for the month of December . The offers include a two-year FGN Savings Bond due December 10, 2027, with an annual interest rate of 12.838 per cent, and a three-year savings bond due December 2028 at 13.839

Title: Trump halts immigration applications from 19 countries under travel restrictions
Summary: The Donald Trump administration has ordered an immediate halt to immigration applications from 19 countries already subject to travel bans or restrictions . The four-page directive states that the pause, which applies to both green card and citizenship applications, is intended to allow for heightened security screenings . The move comes just days after two National Guard members were shot while on patrol

Title: VIDEO: Umahi reunites with Primary school classmates 49 years after graduation
Summary: Minister of Works, David Umahi, recently reconnected with his primary school classmates, 49 years after they completed their studies at Umunaga Community School, Uburu, Ebonyi State .
